column4: I'm trying to install Ubuntu and having a bit of trouble, is this a good place for help? or maybe you're really just a bot ;-)

Ok, it's my first time with linux so i'm a bit lost. i tried to install with a cd but it kept freezing when i would run it without the cd so i tried with a usb. first, it gave me an error message, then after trying some of the suggestions on the forum here, it installed fine but now freezes at the purple screen as had happened before
i have a toshiba sateliite-a135, intel pentium dual-core processor
ok, i verified it and it said it was fine. i'm going to try the nomdeset solution and see if that works
if that fails, consider the alternate installer
